channel.title: Oscar on mathias wellner
channel.description: Recent content in Oscar on mathias wellner

item.title: Quote of the Day
item.description:
The very essence of romance is uncertainty. If ever I get married, I’ll certainly try to forget the fact.

Oscar Wilde, The Importance of Being Earnest

item.title: Quote of the Day
item.description:
It is absurd to divide people into good and bad. People are either charming or tedious.

Oscar Wilde, Lady Windermere’s Fan

item.title: Quote of the Day
item.description:
It is not the perfect but the imperfect who have need of love.

Oscar Wilde, An Ideal Husband

item.title: Quote of the Day
item.description:
A woman’s life revolves in curves of emotion. It is upon lines of intellect that a man’s life progresses.

Oscar Wilde, An Ideal Husband
